Title: Enacts the New York traffic reduction act
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish and administer a program authorizing eligible vehicles to operate in designated high-occupancy vehicle (HOV) lanes, notwithstanding vehicle occupancy.
LawCode: Add ยง224-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the "New York traffic reduction act"
